title: T206 Bull Durham with Reverse Print Piedmont Back
author: setwil

posts.post_title: T206 Bull Durham with Reverse Print Piedmont Back
posts.post_content:
I'm new to this forum but have been a lifelong T206 fan and all things Deadball Era.

I have a T206 Bull Durham card with a Piedmont back which is upside down.  I see various things on miscuts etc., but wanted to see if anyone had heard of this type of upside down back?

Although it is in poor condition is anyone aware of people who might be interested in the card?  I am not focused on miscuts and have a higher condition Durham in my collection.

Thanks all.

Seth
Somewhat desirable, you should post a photo for more responses
Yes, post a photo. There are definitely people here who would be interested in such a card and could give you an idea of what you could get for it.

All my cards have upside down backs.  If you cannot image both sides simultaneously, it would be difficult to prove me wrong.:D

The scraps are less condition sensitive in terms of value, but an image would help in this regard.
